# iosxr_hardware_module_shutdown (Data Source)

This data source can read the Hardware Module Shutdown configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_hardware_module_shutdown" "example" {
  location_name = "0/0/CPU0"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `location_name` (String) Specify the location

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `shut` (Boolean) shutdown the hw-module
- `unshut` (Boolean) Unshut the hw-module
